jobDescription: Senior Data EngineerRequirement:8+ years experience designing, implementing and maintaining relational / data warehousing environments (custom or structured ETL, preferably working directly with large data environments)Familiarity with Data Warehousing concepts (e.g. dimensional data modeling) and schema design (e.g. Star, snowflake, etc.)Experience building and launching efficient & reliable data pipelines to move data (both large and small amounts) throughout Data Warehouse.Experience in Redshift SQL(PostgreSQL) or MySQL, with ability to optimize queries for high volume environmentsExperience in Big Data frameworks (such as Hadoop, Hive, Kafka, Spark is a plus)Experience in data modeling for complicated business problems, designing ETL / data pipeline solutions (such as Talend/Python preferred), and working in columnar databases (Amazon Redshift preferred)Experience in payments (Good Domain knowledge on Financial Services Industry)Previous work with NoSQL DBs such as DynamoDB, Cassandra, MongoDB, HBase
